equipId.Wiki: ID of the equipment for sale

value.Wiki: Selling price to overwrite (-1: Do not overwrite)

mtrlId.Wiki: Material ID required for purchase (-1: None)

eventFlag_forStock.Wiki: Event flag value that holds the number

costType.Wiki: Price type. Applies only when overwriting the selling price

setNum.Wiki: Number of sets sold. Number of pieces you can get with one purchase (default: 1)

value_Add.Wiki: Correction (addition) to the selling price of equipment. Equipment para selling price x magnification + addition

value_Magnification.Wiki: Correction (magnification) to the selling price of equipment. Equipment para selling price x magnification + addition

iconId.Wiki: Menu display_icon ID (-1: do not overwrite)

nameMsgId.Wiki: Menu display_text ID (-1: do not overwrite)

menuTitleMsgId.Wiki: Text ID of the shop menu title (-1: Do not overwrite). This value of the first para found in the para ID range passed when launching the shop is referenced

menuIconId.Wiki: Shop menu icon ID (-1: Do not overwrite). This value of the first para found in the para ID range passed when launching the shop is referenced

Self.Wiki:
Defines trades available in shops.
Available trades in a given shop are determined by a range defined in ESD and by game flags.
Items sold for less than their sell price will not appear in shops.
Material costs may not be shown in shop variants.
